description: A cheerful (though not overly bright) second-year student at Rikkyoin High. She is the group`s "President", and therefore is a candidate to be next year`s Student Council President. Tokino loves mushrooms to the point of obsession. Her knowledge of mushrooms is encyclopaedic; she knows them by sight and has an insatiable appetite for them. She is often seen carrying around a thick book entitled Mushrooms of the World.
name: Akiyama Tokino
